description:
Do you want to know how to use Pinterest to get more traffic, leads and sales for your business? Whether you are an entrepreneur, an author, a coach or a blogger who uses social media, this course can teach you tried-and-true strategies for using Pinterest to grow your business.

The course is for beginners, intermediate and advanced users and it contains 22 video sessions, along with downloadable worksheets.

After you take this course, you will not only have a Pinterest account for your business, but you'll also start getting more traffic and sales from this amazing social media network.
title: Pinterest Advantage
